item.description:
This place is like a little hidden secret. If you blink you'll drive past it. But it's worth coming in for their mouth watering delicious omelettes, panini's, wraps and rolls, baked goods etc etc, and of course their coffee.  Giant View Cafe got a very good review by restaurants.com.

Giant View Cafe has an outdoor patio in the front. On a sunny day we can sit outside. This promises to be a great meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sitting in at the front table with a meetup sign
item.name: Walk Your Coffee Talk To Giant View Cafe in Hamden, CT
